title: How to Find Any Term of a Geometric Sequence

steps.title: Identify the first term in the sequence, call this number a.
steps.content: Identify the first term in the sequence, call this number a . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Calculate the common ratio (r) of the sequence.
steps.content: Calculate the common ratio (r) of the sequence. It can be calculated by dividing any term of the geometric sequence by the term preceding it. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Identify the number of term you wish to find in the sequence.
steps.content: Identify the number of term you wish to find in the sequence. Call this number n . [4] X Research source For example, if you wish to find the 8 th term in the sequence, then n = 8.

steps.title: The nth term is given by arn-1.
steps.content: The n th term is given by ar n-1 . Simply insert the values of a , r and n in this formula and evaluate the resulting expression to get the n th term. [5] X Research source
